title: I am having an IBPS PO exam in October. I am feeling low. I don't have confidence to crack the exam. What should I do now? - Quora

response.answer_text: Feeling low is natural for any aspirant. Start you laptop and watch a motivational movie/video such that you get back to your studies. First clear your basic concepts using the following books:a) Analytical reasoning by mk pandeyb) quicker math by m.tyrac) quantitative aptitude by rs agarwald) learn english grammar from wren& martin or any good book or siteAfter you clear your basics you need to subscribe for any good test series. Give test in every alternate days and keep analysing where you did mistake. This way you can remove your weak point. If you want to improve your vocabulary then follow this link: My Vocabulary Collection
